title: AnnexRepo.enable_remote() should do some sort of error handling

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
This can fail in many ways: wrong credentials, no connectivity, ...

Error introspection should be done in this function.

Here is a demo of the eruption that happens when one types a password wrong (where there is no visual feedback, and you only have one chance):

```
user: ddd

password: 
[ERROR  ] Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'enableremote', 'box.com'] under '/tmp/demo'. Exit code=1. out=enableremote box.com (testing WebDAV server...) 
| failed
|  err=git-annex: WebDAV test failed: StatusCodeException (Status {statusCode = 401, statusMessage = "Unauthorized"}) [("Server","ATS"),("Date","Thu, 31 Aug 2017 14:36:43 GMT"),("Content-Type","application/xml; charset=utf-8"),("Content-Length","188"),("WWW-Authenticate","Basic realm=\"dav.box.com\""),("Vary","Accept-Encoding"),("Content-Encoding","gzip"),("Age","1"),("Connection","keep-alive"),("X-Response-Body-Start","<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<d:error xmlns:d=\"DAV:\" xmlns:s=\"http://sabredav.org/ns\">\n  <s:exception>Sabre_DAV_Exception_NotAuthenticated</s:exception>\n  <s:message>Username or password does not match</s:message>\n</d:error>\n"),("X-Request-URL","MKCOL https://dav.box.com:443/dav/team/project_one/tmp")] (CJ {expose = []}): user error
| git-annex: enableremote: 1 failed
|  
Failed to run ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'annex', 'enableremote', 'box.com'] under '/tmp/demo'. Exit code=1. out=enableremote box.com (testing WebDAV server...) 
failed
 err=git-annex: WebDAV test failed: StatusCodeException (Status {statusCode = 401, statusMessage = "Unauthorized"}) [("Server","ATS"),("Date","Thu, 31 Aug 2017 14:36:43 GMT"),("Content-Type","application/xml; charset=utf-8"),("Content-Length","188"),("WWW-Authenticate","Basic realm=\"dav.box.com\""),("Vary","Accept-Encoding"),("Content-Encoding","gzip"),("Age","1"),("Connection","keep-alive"),("X-Response-Body-Start","<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<d:error xmlns:d=\"DAV:\" xmlns:s=\"http://sabredav.org/ns\">\n  <s:exception>Sabre_DAV_Exception_NotAuthenticated</s:exception>\n  <s:message>Username or password does not match</s:message>\n</d:error>\n"),("X-Request-URL","MKCOL https://dav.box.com:443/dav/team/project_one/tmp")] (CJ {expose = []}): user error
git-annex: enableremote: 1 failed
enableremote box.com (testing WebDAV server...) 
failed
git-annex: WebDAV test failed: StatusCodeException (Status {statusCode = 401, statusMessage = "Unauthorized"}) [("Server","ATS"),("Date","Thu, 31 Aug 2017 14:36:43 GMT"),("Content-Type","application/xml; charset=utf-8"),("Content-Length","188"),("WWW-Authenticate","Basic realm=\"dav.box.com\""),("Vary","Accept-Encoding"),("Content-Encoding","gzip"),("Age","1"),("Connection","keep-alive"),("X-Response-Body-Start","<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>\n<d:error xmlns:d=\"DAV:\" xmlns:s=\"http://sabredav.org/ns\">\n  <s:exception>Sabre_DAV_Exception_NotAuthenticated</s:exception>\n  <s:message>Username or password does not match</s:message>\n</d:error>\n"),("X-Request-URL","MKCOL https://dav.box.com:443/dav/team/project_one/tmp")] (CJ {expose = []}): user error
git-annex: enableremote: 1 failed
```
